style=”color-strip-reveal” color=”Extra-Color-1″ text=”Welcome To Mamba Point Hotel”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1577287683864{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;}”]The hotel’s meeting space and dining options provide convenient and ideal venues for meeting and entertaining under one roof. Arrange your conferences, meetings, receptions or other events in La Mamba Conference/Banquet Hall which can host up to 200 persons. We ensure all your meetings and events are a memorable experience. Wifi and projectors are also available.
For your private meetings and parties avail of our VIP room adjacent to The Gallery Restaurant which accommodates 35 persons seated.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
